description:
The map to happiness scatters, and her body seeks unique pleasure.
Tomoya and Kanako are a loving couple and are about to get married. Today, Tomoya went to Kanako`s parents` house to greet them, but due to his nervousness, Tomoya couldn`t speak very well. Tomoya was depressed about being unable to show his masculine character.
In order to cheer up Tomoya, Kanako used her plump body to inspire him. Kanako is a bit helpless when it comes to men, but she`s happy that her affectionate married life with Tomoya is about to start. 
However, when Kanako visited Tomoya`s father`s house, her reason crumbles.
Source: Getchu (translated)

titles.title: A Part of Her Which I Haven`t Seen Before
Ore ga Mite Koto no Nai Kanojo
俺が見たことのない彼女
